imdb.plot outline: MLB Advanced Media and Google partnered to deliver MLB's first virtual reality series. This VR series profiles baseball's top young talent with unparalleled access to MLB player's daily routines and field access while learning what drives them. Go inside the batting cage as Mookie Betts takes pre-game batting practice, stand next to Robbie Ray and Chris Archer as they warm up on the mound, or go inside the Red Sox clubhouse and sit in the St. Louis Cardinals bullpen during a game. This is the closest you will ever get to knowing what it's like to be a professional baseball player.
imdb.title: MLB VR: On The Verge
akas: MLB VR: On The Verge (United States)
